sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>true</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Network Service Request - New Service">670690da1bf5f110824752c1604bcbe7</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:d131619e1b713510824752c1604bcb73</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>onChange WAN Service Def- Get Svc Code</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }
	
	// alert('newValue = ' + newValue);

     var ga = new GlideAjax('x_g_sonc_ns_pro.service_definition_ajax');
    ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getSvcDef');
    ga.addParam('sysparm_sysid', newValue);
    ga.getXMLAnswer(getSvcDef);

    function getSvcDef(response) {
		
		// alert(response);

        var def = JSON.parse(response);
        g_form.setValue('service_code', def.svc_code);
		g_form.setValue('service_level', def.svc_ha_category);
		
		// alert('service_level = ' + g_form.getValue('service_level'));

    }
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>wbbusby</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-12-04 14:49:30</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>65ab9e131bfab510824752c1604bcb33</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>onChange WAN Service Def- Get Svc Code</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="NS Pro" source="x_g_sonc_ns_pro">b5683ae81b157110824752c1604bcbc0</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NS Pro">b5683ae81b157110824752c1604bcbc0</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_65ab9e131bfab510824752c1604bcb33</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-12-04 14:56:09</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
